name: Roo.DDView
desc: A DnD enabled version of Roo.View.

config.name: dropGroup
config.desc: The ddgroup name(s) for the View's DropZone.

config.name: allowCopy
config.desc: Causes ctrl/drag operations to copy nodes rather than move.

config.name: copy
config.desc: Causes drag operations to copy nodes rather than move.

config.name: dragGroup
config.desc: The ddgroup name(s) for the View's DragZone.

methods.name: getDropPoint
methods.desc: Decide whether to drop above or below a View node.

methods.name: setDeletable
methods.desc: Utility method. Add a delete option to the DDView's context menu.

params.name: imageUrl
params.desc: The URL of the "delete" icon image.

methods.name: setValue
methods.desc: Loads the View from a JSON string representing the Records to put into the Store.

methods.name: getTargetFromEvent
methods.desc:
Part of the Roo.dd.DropZone interface. If no target node is found, the
	whole Element becomes the target, and this causes the drop gesture to append.

methods.name: onDblClick
methods.desc:
Double click fires the event, but also, if this is draggable, and there is only one other
	related DropZone, it transfers the selected node.

methods.name: getDragData
methods.desc:
Create the drag data which consists of an object which has the property "ddel" as
	the drag proxy element.

methods.name: setDraggable
methods.desc: Specify to which ddGroup items in this DDView may be dragged.

methods.name: getName
methods.desc: Allows this class to be an Roo.form.Field so it can be found using {@link Roo.form.BasicForm#findField}.

methods.name: remove
methods.desc: Remove {@link Roo.data.Record}s at the specified indices.

params.name: selectedIndices
params.desc: The index (or Array of indices) of Records to remove.

methods.name: getContextMenu
methods.desc: Return the context menu for this DDView.

methods.name: setDroppable
methods.desc: Specify from which ddGroup this DDView accepts drops.
